item.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West (2014)

info.message: [B][COLOR ffffff00]Plot:[/COLOR][/B] [B] As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his new-found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival. [/B]
